aboutme_description: As a junior full-stack web developer, I design websites and applications by combining front-end and back-end development. Trained in technologies such as HTML, CSS, JavaScript, React, as well as Node.js and MongoDB, I enjoy creating clear, efficient, and user-friendly applications, from design to business logic. I love tackling technical challenges, learning new technologies, and building projects from start to finish. Curious, meticulous, and self-reliant, I am looking for an opportunity to contribute to concrete projects within a dynamic team.
